title: Executive Order 10829-Fleet Admiral William D. Leahy
content: As a mark of respect to the memory of Fleet Admiral William D. Leahy, it is hereby ordered, pursuant to the provisions of Section 4 of Proclamation 3044 of March 1, 1954, that until interment the flag of the United States shall be flown at half-staff on all buildings, grounds, and naval vessels of the Federal Government in the District of Columbia and throughout the United States and its Territories and possessions.
citation: Dwight D. Eisenhower, Executive Order 10829-Fleet Admiral William D. Leahy Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/306817
